OWNER Act
To distribute revenue from offshore wind projects in the New York Bight Area to certain coastal States, and promote conservation and workforce development.

bill.summary:
Offshore Wind for Northeastern Energy Revenue Act or the OWNER Act
This bill expands revenue sharing for offshore wind projects on the Outer Continental Shelf within the New York Bight Area, including for rentals, royalties, and bonus bids. The New York Bight Area is the area extending generally northeast from Cape May in New Jersey to Montauk Point on the eastern tip of Long Island, New York.
